item.title: Aviation
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 50 ml gin
  • 20 ml lemon juice
  • 10 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • 5ml crème de violette (optional)
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Corpse reviver no. 2
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 20 ml gin
  • 20 ml triple sec
  • 20 ml Lillet Blanc
  • 20 ml lemon juice
  • 4 dashes absinthe (optional)
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

Rinse glass with absinthe. Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Gin and tonic
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml gin
  • 90 ml tonic water
  • (garnish) lime or lemon wedge

Instructions

Build in highball glass over ice. Garnish.

item.title: Martini
item.description:
This is a “traditional” Martini with a greater amount of vermouth than is common today. Decrease the vermouth as you see fit. Make sure the drink and glass are cold.

Ingredients

  • 60 ml gin
  • 30 ml dry vermouth
  • 2 dashes orange bitters
  • (garnish) lemon twist or olives

Instructions

Stir ingredients over ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Tom Collins
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml gin
  • 30 ml lemon juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • soda water
  • (garnish) lemon or lime slice

Instructions

Add ingredients except soda to highball glass and stir to combine. Add soda water to halfway up glass. Fill glass with ice. Garnish.
